dependencies: google-auth-oauthlib (imported in app/__init__.py; transitive/undeclared in requirements.txt)
architectural_resources: Google OAuth 2.0 client credentials (expects client_secret.json; used by google_auth_oauthlib.flow.Flow.from_client_secrets_file in app/__init__.py)
Gmail API access (SCOPES include gmail.readonly and gmail.modify in app/__init__.py)
